tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TelehealthServiceData (
	record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id UUID,
	service_date DATE,
	service_type VARCHAR(50),
	doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
	hospital_name VARCHAR(100),
	billing_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE telehealth_services (
    service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    provider_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    service_date DATE,
    service_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender CHAR(1),
    service_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES telehealth_services(service_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    patient_age INT NOT NULL,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    patient_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE appointment_data (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appointment_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    medical_condition TEXT,
    prescription VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_data(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  appointment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  doctor_id INT REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id),
  appointment_date DATE,
  reason_for_visit TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  doctor_id INT REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id),
  diagnosis TEXT,
  prescription TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Telehealth_Appointments(
    appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    appointment_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Telehealth_Patients(
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Telehealth_Providers(
    provider_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(100),
    provider_specialty VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Telehealth_Reports(
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    appointment_id UUID,
    report_date DATE,
    report_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Telehealth_Billing(
    billing_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    appointment_id UUID,
    billing_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    billing_status VARCHAR(20)
)
